# stackedLayoutAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance attributes for items with a stacked layout.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var stackedLayoutAppearance: UITabBarItemAppearance { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you didn’t provide a set of explicit attributes at initialization time, UIKit provides an object with default attributes.

## Configuring stacked item appearances

- **stackedItemPositioning**: The scheme to use when positioning stacked items within the tab bar.
- **stackedItemSpacing**: The amount of space to insert between stacked tab bar items.
- **stackedItemWidth**: The width of stacked items in the tab bar.
